backend/main.mo: Backend canister managing user profiles and financial entries with access control and CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing files and components involved in adding the Android APK build workflow.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file.
frontend/ANDROID_APK.md: Guide explaining prerequisites and steps to build a debug APK using Capacitor and Android Studio.
frontend/android/.gitignore: Gitignore rules for Android build artifacts, configs, and IDE files.
frontend/android/app/build.gradle: Gradle config for the Android app including SDK versions, dependencies, and build settings.
frontend/android/app/capacitor.build.gra: Auto-generated Capacitor build config setting Java compatibility and plugin variables.
frontend/android/app/proguard-rules.pro: ProGuard rules preserving Capacitor and app classes and WebView JS interfaces.
frontend/android/app/src/main/AndroidMan: Android manifest defining app metadata, permissions, MainActivity, and FileProvider.
frontend/android/app/src/main/java/com/e: Main activity initializing Capacitor Bridge and applying WebView configuration.
Configures WebView settings including JS, storage, mixed content, caching, and user agent.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/drawab: Defines the splash screen layout with a white background and centered launcher icon.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/mipmap: Round adaptive launcher icon using the same background and foreground assets.
Adaptive launcher icon definition with background and foreground layers.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/values: Color resources defining primary, dark primary, and accent colors.
App string resources including app name and package identifiers.
App themes defining primary colors, no-action-bar mode, and splash screen style.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/xml/fi: FileProvider path configuration enabling cache and external file access.
frontend/android/build.gradle: Top-level Android project build script defining repositories, plugins, and clean task.
frontend/android/capacitor-cordova-andro: Gitignore for Capacitor Cordova plugin build artifacts.
Gradle config for Capacitor Cordova plugins module with SDK versions and dependencies.
Auto-generated Capacitor variables defining SDK versions and dependency versions.
frontend/android/capacitor.settings.grad: Auto-generated settings linking the Capacitor Android module from node_modules.
frontend/android/gradle.properties: Configures Gradle behavior, JVM args, AndroidX settings, Flipper version, and architecture/new architecture flags.
frontend/android/gradle/wrapper/gradle-w: Specifies Gradle wrapper distribution settings using Gradle 8.0.
frontend/android/gradlew: UNIX shell script to bootstrap and run the Gradle wrapper.
frontend/android/gradlew.bat: Windows batch script to execute the Gradle wrapper.
frontend/android/settings.gradle: Includes Android app modules and applies Capacitor settings.
frontend/android/variables.gradle: Defines Android build versions and library dependency versions.
frontend/capacitor.config.ts: Capacitor config defining app metadata, web directory, and Android server settings.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind setup and theme CSS variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app root and main script.
frontend/scripts/android/build-debug-apk: Build script that compiles the web app, syncs Capacitor, and builds a debug APK.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling auth, profile setup, theming, and page navigation.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Protects content behind Internet Identity login, showing a login card if unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth flow and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Period: Date range selector with presets and popover calendars for filtering dashboard data.
frontend/src/components/entries/DeleteEn: Confirmation dialog to delete an entry, calling the delete mutation and showing feedback.
frontend/src/components/entries/EditEntr: Dialog component for editing an existing entry, handling form state, validation, and update mutation.
frontend/src/components/entries/EntriesE: Displays an empty-state card with an illustration when no entries exist.
frontend/src/components/entries/EntriesM: Renders a mobile-friendly list of entries with type, date, amount, and edit/delete actions.
frontend/src/components/entries/EntriesT: Main entries view with filters, date range selection, table rendering, and edit/delete dialogs.
frontend/src/components/entries/EntryFor: Form for creating new expense or saving entries with validation and mutation submission.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Header with logo, user greeting, login, and navigation between dashboard and entries pages.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Wraps pages with header, main content area, and footer with attribution link.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Dialog prompting users to enter and save their name as part of profile setup.
React Query hook to fetch dashboard data from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useEntries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching, creating/updating, and deleting entry records with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useUserProfil: Provides React Query hooks to fetch and update the caller's user profile, role, and admin status using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for authentication, handling login state, identity loading, and context access.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme variables, dark mode styles, and mobile-friendly adjustments.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the dashboard UI, filtering entries by date to compute totals and category breakdowns for display.
frontend/src/pages/EntriesPage.tsx: Displays the entries page with a form for adding entries and a table listing existing entries.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Formats numeric values into INR currency strings using locale formatting.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for getting, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including support for hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the projectâ€™s current state, features, issues, and architectural notes for an expense and savings tracking app.
